meta.title: SatoshiFi - Trustless Bitcoin Custody Factory on EVM
meta.description: Universal factory for creating self-custody and federated Bitcoin solutions on EVM networks. Trustless, bridgeless system with flexible economics.

hero.title: Trustless Bitcoin Custody Factory on EVM
hero.subtitle: Universal factory for creating self-custody and federated Bitcoin solutions. Configure threshold schemes, select custodians, and launch your own solution with custom rules.

self_custody.title: Self-Custody (1-of-1)
self_custody.description: Personal Bitcoin wallet with full control. Your keys, your coins. Native Bitcoin addresses controlled via FROST threshold signatures.

federated.title: Federated Custody (M-of-N)
federated.description: Group fund management with distributed responsibility. Family vaults (2-of-3), corporate treasury (5-of-7), or custom threshold schemes.

trustless_bridge.title: Trustless Bridge
trustless_bridge.description: No bridges, no trusted intermediaries. SPV verification of Bitcoin transactions directly on-chain with automatic collateralization.

flexible_economics.title: Flexible Economics
flexible_economics.description: Creator defines all monetization parameters. From non-profit family vaults to commercial custody services with customizable fee structures.

frost.title: FROST Protocol
frost.description: Threshold signature scheme for secure multi-party custody. 1-of-1 for self-custody, M-of-N for federated solutions.

spv.title: SPV Verification
spv.description: On-chain Bitcoin transaction verification without trusted bridges. Cryptographic proof of Bitcoin deposits and withdrawals.

factory.title: Factory Cloning
factory.description: Proven contracts cloned with unique parameters. Each solution gets its own economics, rules, and custodian configuration.
